globalErrors.GUILD_ONLY: This command cannot be used in DMs.

strings.TITLE: An unknown error has occured.
strings.DESCRIPTION:
We have no clue what this issue may be. Here is the error message we received:
<MESSAGE>
This was automatically reported to us, and we'll make sure to fix it as soon as possible. Sorry for the inconvenience.

strings.TITLE: Hold it!
strings.DESCRIPTION: You will be able to use this <TYPE> in <TIME>...

meta.name: balance
meta.description: View a user's Purplet balance, or yours.

options.name: user
options.description: The user to view the balance of

strings.LEADERBOARD_DESCRIPTION: <PLACE> out of <TOTAL> people on the global leaderboard

options.name: color
options.description: Color to change your accent color to. Use one of the suggestions or a HEX color.

errors.NO_DISCORD_COLOR: You do not have a Discord profile color to sync from! To set one, edit your Discord User Profile and change your Profile Color.
errors.INVALID_COLOR_NAME: You need to enter a valid or a color name. Use /color list for more info.

strings.EMBED_SYNC_INFO: Your Discord profile color will be synced to your CRBT accent color.
strings.EMBED_DESCRIPTION: This color will be used across most of CRBT's replies to you, as well as on your profile and info cards, when someone else visits them.

options.name: destination
options.description: Where to send the reminder (leave blank to send it by DM).

errors.SUBJECT_MAX_LENGTH: Subject must be 120 characters or less.
errors.PAST: You cannot set a reminder in the past.
errors.INVALID_FORMAT: The time you entered is in an invalid format, or below 0 seconds in the future.
errors.TOO_LONG: You cannot set a reminder for more than 2 years from now.
errors.INVALID_CHANNEL_TYPE: The channel you specified is not a valid text channel.
errors.BOT_MISSING_PERMS: I do not have permission to send messages in this channel.
errors.USER_MISSING_PERMS: You do not have permission to send messages in this channel.
errors.REMINDERS_MAX_LIMIT: You cannot set more than 5 reminders at once.

strings.SUCCESS_DM: You will be reminded by DM
strings.SUBJECT: Subject
strings.GCALENDAR_EVENT_DM: You will be also reminded by DM.
strings.GCALENDAR_EVENT_CHANNEL: You will be also reminded in <CHANNEL>, in <SERVER>.

meta.name: ping
meta.description: Ping CRBT. Returns latency and connection info.

errors.NOT_CMD_USER: Only the person who used this command can use this button.

meta.name: profile
meta.description: Get a user's CRBT profile, or yours.

options.name: lookup_discord
options.description: Search via Discord user IDs or names.

errors.NOT_FOUND: Couldn't find a profile with that username. Make sure to use the autocomplete to find profiles!
errors.CAN_ONLY_EDIT_OWN_PROFILE: You can only edit your own profile.

strings.NAME: Name
strings.MODAL_NAME_PLACEHOLDER: A unique name, can only have letters, numbers or spaces.
strings.MODAL_BIO_PLACEHOLDER: Tell us about yourself. CRBTscript tags accepted.
strings.MODAL_WEBSITE_PLACEHOLDER: A link to your website, blog, Twitter...
strings.MODAL_BIRTHDAY_PLACEHOLDER: Your birthday, in the YYYY-MM-DD format.
strings.MODAL_PRONOUNS_PLACEHOLDER: What pronouns should we use for you? (e.g. they/them)

meta.name: avatar default
meta.description: Get a user's default avatar, or yours if you don't specify one.

options.name: user
options.description: The user to get the avatar of.

options.name: size
options.description: The size of the avatar to get.

options.name: format
options.description: The format of the avatar to get.

strings.EMBED_TITLE: Thanks for inviting <CRBT> to your server!
strings.EMBED_DESCRIPTION:
<CRBT> is now in <SERVERS> servers!
To get started with CRBT, simply type `/` and click its avatar!
For more help and info, visit the **[support server](<DISCORD>)**.

errors.DMS_DISABLED: You must enable your DMs or unblock CRBT in order to bookmark messages.

meta.name: hourly
meta.description: Get a few Purplets every hour.

strings.EMBED_DESCRIPTION:
You have claimed your hourly **<EMOJI> <PURPLETS> Purplets**.
Current streak: **<STREAK>/5**
strings.STREAK: (<STREAK_LEFT> more to go for a bonus!)
strings.EMBED_REMINDER: Click the button below to set yourself a reminder to claim your hourly Purplets again.

meta.name: role-picker new
meta.description: Manually create a new Role Picker, a menu for members to choose roles themselves.

options.name: description
options.description: Describe to your members what your Role Picker is for.

options.name: behavior
options.description: How the Role Picker should behave.

options.name: limit
options.description: How much roles can be selected. Set to 0 for unlimited.

options.name: role
options.description: A role to assign to the member when selected.

meta.name: role-picker preset
meta.description: Create a new Role Picker using one of the presets.

options.name: preset
options.description: A preset to choose from. CRBT will auto create the roles and send a pretty embed.

colors.name: Colors
colors.message: Choose one of the options below to change your displayed name color in the server!

pronouns.name: Pronouns
pronouns.message: Use the options below to select what pronouns you'd like to display on the server!

zodiacSigns.name: Zodiac Signs
zodiacSigns.message: Choose one of the options below to select your zodiac sign!

verification.name: Human Verification
verification.message: Click on the button below to verify your account.

errors.USER_MISSING_PERMS: Only server administrators can create Role Pickers.
errors.BOT_MISSING_PERMS: I need the "Manage Roles" permission in order to create a Role Picker.
errors.ROLE_DOES_NOT_EXIST: Role <ROLE> does not exist or has been removed. Contact an admin to resolve the issue.
errors.ROLES_DO_NOT_EXIST: One or more of the roles you specified do not exist or have been removed. Contact an admin to resolve the issue.
errors.BUTTON_ROLES_ONCE: You can only select this role once, and you can't remove it.

strings.EMBED_FOOTER: Note: CRBT is not affiliated with any of the role names or with server.
strings.GENERIC_SELECTOR_TITLE: Select one or multiple roles by choosing them below.
strings.BUTTON_ROLES_ADD_AGAIN: Select it again to remove it.
strings.BUTTON_ROLES_REMOVE_AGAIN: Select it again to add it.
strings.SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: Members will now available to select roles from this menu. To disable it, simply delete the Role Picker message.

FARMER.name: Farmer
FARMER.description: Harvest crops, and sell them for Purplets.
strings: You plant trees and flowers, and earn <PURPLETS>
You harvested a couple of melons and earned <PURPLETS>
You sold 20 carrots and got <PURPLETS>
You sold two pounds of turnips worth <PURPLETS>
You sold a bag of patatoes for <PURPLETS>
You harvested and sold two watermelons for <PURPLETS>
You sold two of your cows to another farmer and got <PURPLETS>
You farm all day alone to get <PURPLETS>

CASHIER.name: Cashier
CASHIER.description: Scan these barcodes and earn some Purplets.
strings: A person bought a lot of toilet paper you sold for <PURPLETS>
Someone gave you a tip of <PURPLETS>
You did your job well and the boss gives you <PURPLETS>
You put all your heart and soul scanning these barcodes and you earned <PURPLETS>
You recommend someone they buy extra, and they did! You get <PURPLETS>
You sit on the chair all day at your desk, watching people, waiting for customers to arrive, and boringly enough you earn <PURPLETS>

BAKER.name: Baker
BAKER.description: Make cakes, bake bread, bread cakes and cake breads for Purplets üçû.

COOK.name: Cook
COOK.description: Cook delicious food from around the world.

DEVELOPER.name: Developer
DEVELOPER.description: Develop new software, games and all kinds of fun stuff!
strings: You hate the testers so much but you still earned <PURPLETS>
You rewrote the whole Python language in C++, everyone's minds are blown away and you get <PURPLETS>
You find a bug on CRBT and decide to report it. As a congratulation, you earned <PURPLETS>
The boss gets mad looking at your spaghetti code! Luckily, an opponent sitting right next to you had much better code so you steal it and earn <PURPLETS>
You design a much much better bot than CRBT... wait that's impossible, right???? Anyway, you earn <PURPLETS>

DOCTOR.name: Doctor
DOCTOR.description: Save people by healing their wounds and by curing their diseases and illnesses.
strings: You pull out a heart out of a human mannequin and earned <PURPLETS>
You managed to fake someone's death to "revive" them, nobody noticed the trickery and are very impressed! You get <PURPLETS>
You found a cure to this popular disease going on, and you earn <PURPLETS>
You make a sick guy eat a rock because you thought it would be funny, but turns out he somewhat got cured. So strangely enough you earn <PURPLETS>

TEACHER.name: Teacher
TEACHER.description: Teach people math, science, history, and many other subjects!

ENGINEER.name: Engineer
ENGINEER.description: Build advanced machinery and tools using the latest technologies.

POLICE_OFFICER.name: Police Officer
POLICE_OFFICER.description: Protect people from crime and law.
strings: You got hurt in the line of duty and had to stay a few days in hospital. But you make a full recovery. You earn <PURPLETS>
Today was quite quiet... That was until a rookie said that, then all heck broke loose. You were paid <PURPLETS>
You and the boys catch a drug dealer on the street! You get <PURPLETS>
You find a dead body and report it. Its discovery makes you gain <PURPLETS>

FIREFIGHTER.name: Firefighter
FIREFIGHTER.description: Fight fires, protect the city and save lives.

LAWYER.name: Lawyer
LAWYER.description: Sue people for their crimes and get them to pay their bills.

MUSICIAN.name: Musician
MUSICIAN.description: Sing songs, create music pieces and sell them to build your musician career.
strings: You make a song while you're bored... Turns out, it gets you <PURPLETS>
You played that very sick theme everyone likes, and you got tipped <PURPLETS>
You wrote a very cool song for a big artist, their corporation gives you <PURPLETS>

ATHLETE.name: Athlete
ATHLETE.description: Compete in all kinds of sports and win Purplets for your achievements.

STREAMER.name: Streamer
STREAMER.description: Stream your favorite games, make funny jokes and talk with your viewers to earn Purplets from them.

ARTIST.name: Artist
ARTIST.description: Create art, make posters and other art and sell them for Purplets.
strings: You animated a fanfiction and earned <PURPLETS>
You drew an epic fanart for some big content creator! They feature you on their socials and pay you <PURPLETS>
You made a really cool piece of art that some rich people buys for <PURPLETS>

WRITER.name: Writer
WRITER.description: Write stories, poems, novels, fanfics, books... and sell them for Purplets!

INFLUENCER.name: Influencer
INFLUENCER.description: Spread your message, get people to follow you and get sponsors to pay you Purplets.
strings: You made an epic video game funnies compilation and got <PURPLETS>
Someone posted a drama about you! You replied in a sponsored apology video which earned you <PURPLETS>
You uploaded a movie illegally onto YouTube flooded with ads that make you earn <PURPLETS>
You posted some funny memes, some random guy gave you <PURPLETS>
Your longplay on that hot new video game got kinda popular to the point where you get <PURPLETS>
Your latest video got shared a lot, and that reflects on your earnings! You earned <PURPLETS>
You uploaded a gaming video on YouTube and managed to get 60k views and <PURPLETS>
You made a very clickbaity video and got <PURPLETS>
You make a product placement deal that got you <PURPLETS>
A rich and famous YouTuber made a video about you and you earned <PURPLETS>
You are chatting with your viewers on stream as a Vtuber visits your channel, and their fans donate you <PURPLETS>
